title: Roast cod with creamy kale & potatoes

ingredients.item: 260g pack 2 Waitrose Skinless & Boneless Cod Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Place the cod in a small roasting tin, season and sprinkle with the chilli flakes. Roast for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes and kale in boiling water for 7 minutes or until the potatoes are tender then drain well.
Add the mustard and crème fraîche to the pan and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the potatoes and kale, and heat through. Season to taste and serve topped with the roast cod.
